titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. J. H. Husbands & Frank Wilkinson, Indictment
CWG5147

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
State of Kentucky
County of Graves } Sct.
Graves Circuit Court
The Commonwealth of Kentucky
Against
J H Husbands & Frank Wilkinson

The Grand Jury of Graves County in the name & by the Authority of the Commonwealth of Kentucky J H Husbands & Frank Wilkinson of the crime of Robbery committed as follows viz. The sd J H Husbands & Frank Wilkinson did on the 18th day of May 1863 in the County aforesaid feloniously make an assault in and upon J M Adams & him the said J M Adams in bodily fear and danger of his life then and there feloniously did put and rifle gun of the value of twenty Dollars and one pair of boots of the value of five dollars of the goods and chattel & personal property of the said J M Adams then & there feloniously and violently did steal take & carry away Against the peace and dignity of the Commonwealth of Kentucky.

P. D. Yeiser
Commonwealth attorney for 1st Judicial District
Information by Miss H J Adams. Mrs. J. M. Adams. J M Adams J E Adams & H L Anderson

Endorse
Bail is fixed on this indictment at Eight Hundred Dollars for each defendant
C S. Marshall
A true Bill
H. S. Anderson, Foreman

Filed May 22d 1863
WA Turner C G C C

A Copy attest
W A Turner c g c c

Comlth
vs } Robbery
Husbands et al
(Copy)
